column4: hi, i wanted to know how i could get a sony camcorder to work with my ubuntu 11.04 laptop, as i plug in the usb cord to camcorder then computer but can't get the videos off the camcorder dvd
Have you tried to mount it - as a storage device?
So you're able to mount the cam as a device, coolbeans - what if you change the settings for nautilus to "view hidden files" - do you see anything?
